snippet: The list of grievances Sunday included the crackdown on illegal immigrants and foreclosures across the country, but there were fewer protesters than some had anticipated.
abstract: Protesters from scores of groups around the country fill the streets of Charlotte, NC, to push their agenda as Democrats gather in the city for their convention.
lead_paragraph: The list of grievances Sunday included the crackdown on illegal immigrants and foreclosures across the country, but there were fewer protesters than some had anticipated.

headline.seo: Protesters Gather in Charlotte for Democratic Convention
headline.main: As Democratic Convention Nears, Demonstrators Take to the Streets of Charlotte
headline.print_headline: As Democratic Convention Nears, Demonstrators Take to the Streets of Charlotte
